Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_register_3D_EOS_callback

The function AIL_register_3D_EOS_callback arranges for callback service to be provided to an application function immediately upon reaching the end of a 3D sample.

AIL3DSAMPLECB AIL_register_3D_EOS_callback(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  AIL3DSAMPLECB EOS
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the 3D sample for which end-of-sample (EOS) callback service is desired.
EOS
should be set to the address of the callback function which is to be invoked just after the last audio data block in a sample is merged into the 3D buffer. A value of NULL cancels end-of-sample callbacks.

Returns

The address of the previously-installed EOS callback function handler.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL3DSAMPLECB
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE
Related FAQs: What's the deal with callbacks - are they threads, interrupts, system timers, or what?
